example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-3 (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM علاقات) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الولايات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتحدة)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اتسمت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC دائما)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المرارة)))))

arg.g: Our relation with the United States
